node.title: Multiple people reported shot at New York subway station
node.description: Multiple people were shot at a subway station in the Sunset Park neighborhood of Brooklyn, officials told CBS News.
node.content: ["Multiple people were shot at a subway station in Brooklyn, New York, on Tuesday morning, the city's fire department told CBS News.", "There's a heavy police presence at the station in the Sunset Park neighborhood, at 36th Street and Fourth Avenue, CBS New York reports. The NYPD is reporting a smoke condition at the station. An NYPD official tells CBS News a smoke bomb device was found.\u00a0", "A photo from the scene showed people tending to bloodied passengers lying on the floor of the station.", "The D, N, and R subway trains are holding in stations in both directions in Brooklyn, and there are other delays as well.\u00a0", "This is a developing story and will be updated.", "-Pat Milton contributed reporting. The Associated Press contributed reporting."]
